Title: Mesmerising maestro, dynamic duo
Content: Vyjayanthimala was a name to reckon with in the firmament of pure Bharatanatyam in her heyday. But to draw a houseful of aficionados, who were literally willing to accommodate themselves in the aisle
Author: Ranee Kumar
Description: Vyjayanthimala was a name to reckon with in the firmament of pure Bharatanatyam in her heyday. But to draw a houseful of aficionados, who were literally willing to accommodate themselves in the aisle
